name: martial_arts_site
description: A remake of my Father's martial arts website (http://defensiveartsplus.com) in Bootstrap 4

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run copyvideos && npm run copypdfs && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin aboutus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutus.html && usemin classPhotos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/classPhotos.html && usemin classTimesRates.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/classTimesRates.html && usemin classVideos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/classVideos.html && usemin conceptExercisesVideos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/conceptExercisesVideos.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin kataVideos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/kataVideos.html && usemin mitosePhotos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/mitosePhotos.html && usemin posts.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/posts.html && usemin studentResources.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/studentResources.html && usemin templePhotos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/templePhotos.html

author: Frank Smith
